features.name: specialist_tools/researcher_tools.py: get_youtube_stats
features.description: async get_youtube_stats(handle_or_url: str) → ToolResult: calls MetricsLite /api/youtube/stats endpoint (METRICSLITE_URL from config). Returns ToolResult with data: {subscribers, views_30d, videos_count, top_video: {title, views, url}, channel_url}. Falls back to Blotato account data if MetricsLite unavailable.

features.name: specialist_tools/researcher_tools.py: get_platform_metrics
features.description: async get_platform_metrics(platform: str, account: str) → ToolResult: dispatches to appropriate metrics source. TikTok/Instagram → Safari market-research (3106). YouTube → MetricsLite. Twitter → actp_twitter_research Supabase table. Returns unified PlatformMetrics: {platform, account, followers, posts_30d, avg_engagement, top_posts}.

features.name: specialist_tools/researcher_tools.py: safari_research tools
features.description: async safari_twitter_research(keyword: str, count: int=50) → ToolResult: POST to market-research (3106) /api/research/twitter/search. async safari_tiktok_research(keyword, count) → same for tiktok. async safari_instagram_research(keyword, count) → instagram. Returns list of posts with engagement data.

features.name: specialist_tools/researcher_tools.py: get_top_creators + query_research_db
features.description: async get_top_creators(niche: str, platform: str, limit: int=10) → ToolResult: POST /api/research/{platform}/niche to market-research service. async query_research_db(table: str, filters: dict, limit: int=20) → ToolResult: safe read-only Supabase query (whitelist of allowed tables: actp_platform_research, actp_platform_creators, actp_twitter_research).

features.name: specialist_tools/content_tools.py: generate_content_from_blueprint
features.description: async generate_content_from_blueprint(blueprint_id: str, platform: str, variant_count: int=3) → ToolResult: POST to ContentLite (CONTENTLITE_URL) /api/generate/from-blueprint. Returns ContentResult with scripts list, hooks list, CTAs. Reads CONTENTLITE_URL from config.

features.name: specialist_tools/content_tools.py: render_video + get_blueprints
features.description: async render_video(template: str, params: dict) → ToolResult: dispatches remotion_render local_task via ACTP worker. Polls for completion up to 120s. Returns {video_path, duration_s, size_mb}. async get_blueprints(niche: str='', limit: int=5) → ToolResult: queries actp_platform_research Supabase for blueprint data.

features.name: specialist_tools/content_tools.py: content queue + workflow tools
features.description: async get_content_queue(status: str='pending', limit: int=10) → ToolResult: reads actp_jobs Supabase for content-related jobs. async start_workflow(slug: str, params: dict) → ToolResult: POSTs to workflow-engine /api/workflows/{slug}/run. async get_workflow_result(execution_id: str) → ToolResult: GET /api/workflows/executions/{id}.

features.name: specialist_tools/acquisition_tools.py: send_dm
features.description: async send_dm(platform: str, username: str, message: str) → ToolResult: routes to appropriate safari DM service (PLATFORM_PORT_MAP: instagram→3100, twitter→3003, tiktok→3102, linkedin→3105). POST /api/{platform}/dm with {username, message}. Returns {success, verified, strategy, rate_limits}.

features.name: specialist_tools/acquisition_tools.py: CRM + prospect tools
features.description: async get_dm_conversations(platform: str) → ToolResult: GET /api/{platform}/conversations from DM service. async search_prospects(niche: str, platform: str, limit: int=20) → ToolResult: POST /api/research/{platform}/search to market-research. async add_crm_contact(data: dict) → ToolResult: upsert to crm_contacts Supabase. async get_crm_pipeline() → ToolResult: aggregate crm_contacts by stage.

features.name: specialist_tools/publisher_tools.py: timing + enqueue
features.description: async get_best_publish_time(platform: str) → ToolResult: GET PublishLite /api/timing?platform=X for Thompson Sampling optimal time. async enqueue_post(platform: str, content: str, media_path: str|None=None, scheduled_time: str|None=None) → ToolResult: POST MPLite /api/actp/mplite/enqueue. Returns {queue_id, estimated_publish_time}.

features.name: specialist_tools/publisher_tools.py: queue management + performance
features.description: async get_publish_queue(status: str='pending') → ToolResult: GET MPLite /api/actp/mplite/queue. async publish_now(post_id: str) → ToolResult: claim + trigger immediate publish via MPLite. async get_post_performance(post_id: str) → ToolResult: reads actp_published_content Supabase for metrics (views, likes, comments, shares).

features.name: specialist_tools/watchdog_tools.py: service health tools
features.description: async check_service_health(service_name: str) → ToolResult: GET {service_url}/health (uses mcp_servers.json for URL lookup). async check_all_services() → ToolResult: calls health_check() on all services in MCPServiceMesh, returns dict of name→{status, latency_ms}. async get_swarm_status() → ToolResult: calls AgentPool.status() + agent_swarm status.

features.name: specialist_tools/watchdog_tools.py: restart + logs tools
features.description: async restart_service(service_name: str) → ToolResult: calls MCPServiceMesh.restart(name). async get_error_logs(service: str, minutes: int=60) → ToolResult: reads log files (LOGS_DIR from config) or Supabase error tables. async get_job_queue_stats() → ToolResult: Supabase actp_jobs grouped by status + age buckets.

features.name: specialist_tools: tool registry + execution wrapper
features.description: specialist_tools/__init__.py: TOOL_REGISTRY: dict[role, list[ToolDefinition]]. register_tools(role: str) → list[ToolDefinition]. Each tool wrapped with: timeout enforcement (asyncio.wait_for), error catch → ToolResult(success=False, error=...), duration_ms measurement. Tools discoverable by orchestrator for handoff tool_allowed list.

features.name: MetricsLite: POST /api/youtube/stats endpoint
features.description: In metricslite (Vercel), add /api/youtube/stats route: accepts {handle_or_url: string}. Uses YouTube Data API v3 (YOUTUBE_API_KEY env) to fetch channel stats: subscriber_count, view_count, video_count, recent_videos (last 10). Falls back to public scrape if no API key. Returns unified response.

features.name: MetricsLite: POST /api/platform/summary endpoint
features.description: Add /api/platform/summary: accepts {platforms: string[], account_ids: dict}. Aggregates metrics from all configured platforms. YouTube via Data API, Instagram/TikTok via Blotato account stats, Twitter via actp_twitter_research Supabase table. Returns cross-platform summary with totals.
